## Color3.add() method

Creates a new Color3 set with the added values of the current Color3 and of the given one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(otherColor: Color3): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherColor | <code>Color3</code> | defines the second operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the new Color3
